meanings.definition: The act of bringing something up to date.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's aggiornamentos of the lesson plan made it more relevant to the students.
meanings.sent2: The company's aggiornamentos of their technology improved efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The aggiornamentos of the old recipe with new ingredients created a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe received an aggiornamentos with trendy accessories.
meanings.sent5: The aggiornamentos of the classic novel into a modern film captivated a new audience.

meanings.definition: The process of modernizing or reforming something.
meanings.sent1: The aggiornamentos of the city's infrastructure was long overdue.

meanings.definition: A policy of updating or revising.
